meanings.definition: A man of good social standing or a gentleman.
meanings.sent1: The gemman greeted everyone with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: The gemman always dressed impeccably in a suit and tie.
meanings.sent3: The gemman's impeccable manners made him a favorite at social gatherings.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of ordinary men, he stood out like a gemman.
meanings.sent5: His reputation as a gemman spread far and wide.

meanings.definition: Used as a polite form of address for a man.
meanings.sent1: Gemman, may I have a moment of your time?
meanings.sent2: Gemman, please accept this small token of appreciation.
meanings.sent3: Gemman, you truly are a lifesaver!
meanings.sent4: Gemman, your kindness knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: Gemman, your presence lights up the room.
